message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $200. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

I understand that $200 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $170. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, and I'm willing to try to meet you there. I can offer it to you for $155. It's a bit of a stretch for me, but I think it's a fair compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to try to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $150. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $150, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm really close to my minimum price, and I'm not sure I can go any lower. But I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $145. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
